name: My RPG Game
description:
I am building an rpg with rpg maker vx ace. I need some support to make all the assets. I currently have no way to make music or sound fx. I am planning on getting more equipment in the future. I am creating my own graphics to replace the standard stuff in the rpg maker.

          My first project is a classic rpg, with knights, magic, bad guys, and crystals that explode. The world is yours to save(when the game is finished).
          A demo will always be available for free to the public and will change slowly. The demo will never be the whole game. The whole game however when done will be released for free.

My Patreon Page.
